@return.description:
syntax: `@return <type> [description]`
Used to document the return value for a function.
https://esdoc.org/manual/tags.html#-return
https://tsdoc.org/pages/tags/returns/

@return property.description: If return Object, use `@property <type> <property> [description]` for each properties.

@return (single).description:
syntax: `@return <type> [description]`
Used to document the return value for a function.
https://esdoc.org/manual/tags.html#-return
https://tsdoc.org/pages/tags/returns/

@requires.description:
syntax: `@requires <someModuleName>`
This file requires a JavaScript module.
https://jsdoc.app/tags-requires.html
